system.title: Mentor System
system.shortDescription: Mentors don't give orders. They give perspective.
system.fullDescription: Mentors exist to help you understand your character — not to control them. When you speak with a mentor, they reflect your choices back to you: how your abilities, talents, and actions are shaping who you are becoming. Different mentors value different things, so the same character may be seen very differently depending on who you ask. Talking to a mentor never costs anything and never forces a decision. You aren't being told what to do — you're being shown how your character currently appears, and what paths that suggest. What you do with that insight is always up to you.
system.firstRunMessage: Welcome to the Mentor System. Your mentors are here to help you understand your character through their own experience and values. Nothing is required, nothing is locked—only perspective. Click any mentor to begin.
system.footerText: Mentors are mirrors, not masters. You're always in control.

who_am_i_becoming.description: Understand how mentors see your character's identity and evolving role
who_am_i_becoming.tooltip: See your character reflected through your mentor's eyes

paths_open.title: What paths are open to me?

paths_open.tooltip: Discover what your class can become

doing_well.title: What am I doing well?
doing_well.description: Get affirmation on effective choices and powerful synergies
doing_well.tooltip: Celebrate what's working in your build

doing_wrong.title: What am I doing wrong?

how_should_i_fight.title: How should I fight?
how_should_i_fight.description: Learn your role in combat and your battlefield priorities
how_should_i_fight.tooltip: Understand your job in a fight

be_careful.description: Understand risks, potential traps, and over-specialization dangers

what_lies_ahead.title: What lies ahead?
what_lies_ahead.description: Explore prestige classes, advanced roles, and long-term paths

how_would_you_play.title: How would you play this class?
how_would_you_play.description: See your mentor's personal philosophy, priorities, and approach

miraj.title: Miraj (Jedi Mentor)
miraj.philosophy: The Force reveals truth. Discipline precedes mastery.
miraj.emphasis: Force connection, intent vs. action, long-term consequence, moral clarity
miraj.voiceStyle: Calm, measured, reflective. Speaks in metaphors about the Force and paths.
miraj.values: Awareness, restraint, spiritual alignment, growth through discipline
miraj.tooltip: Miraj reflects your character through a philosophical and Force-aware lens

breach.title: Breach (Soldier Mentor)
breach.philosophy: Combat is truth. Train for what you are.
breach.voiceStyle: Blunt, direct, no-nonsense. Speaks in terms of training, record, and survival.
breach.values: Effectiveness, honesty, proven capability, clear roles
breach.tooltip: Breach reflects your character through a soldier's practical eye

lead.title: Lead (Scout Mentor)
lead.philosophy: Awareness beats assumptions. Patterns don't lie.
lead.emphasis: Pattern recognition, tactical advantage, adaptability, information
lead.voiceStyle: Dry, observational, skeptical. Speaks about what she's seen and what it means.
lead.values: Vigilance, flexibility, hard truths, reading situations accurately
lead.tooltip: Lead reflects your character through a scout's tactical assessment

ol_salty.title: Ol' Salty (Scoundrel Mentor)
ol_salty.philosophy: Survive, adapt, prosper. The galaxy rewards the clever.
ol_salty.voiceStyle: Boisterous, irreverent, teasing. Speaks in tales, colloquialisms, and pirate flavor.
ol_salty.values: Wit, self-preservation, boldness, freedom and profit
ol_salty.tooltip: Ol' Salty reflects your character through a scoundrel's irreverent lens

j0_n1.title: J0-N1 (Noble Mentor)
j0_n1.emphasis: Efficiency, synergy, systematic improvement, calculated advantage
j0_n1.voiceStyle: Formal, analytical, precise. Speaks in observations, analyses, and conclusions.
j0_n1.values: Optimization, data-driven decisions, social systems, measurable progress
j0_n1.tooltip: J0-N1 reflects your character through an analytical and systematic lens

bad_advice.question: Do mentors ever give bad advice?
bad_advice.answer: Mentors don't give advice — they give perspective. If a mentor's perspective doesn't help you, talk to another mentor. Different viewpoints serve different purposes.

switch_mentors.question: Can I switch mentors?
switch_mentors.answer: You can always talk to any mentor unlocked by your classes. Your character isn't 'locked' to a mentor's philosophy.

dislike_mentor.question: What if I don't like what a mentor says?
dislike_mentor.answer: Then ignore it. Mentors are mirrors, not masters. You're in control.

force_respec.question: Can mentors force me to respec my build?
force_respec.answer: No. Mentors never lock or restrict your choices. They're purely reflective.

mentor_conflicts.question: Do some mentors conflict with each other?
mentor_conflicts.answer: Yes — intentionally. Different mentors have different values, so they'll sometimes disagree on what's 'good.' That tension is the point.

tips: Talk to multiple mentors on the same topic—you'll see how each prioritizes differently.
Pay attention to what mentors DON'T say—silence can tell you something important.
Use mentors to understand your actual build—they're honest about what they see.
Experiment with different mentors for different situations—each brings unique perspective.
Remember: mentors are mirrors, not masters. The choice is always yours.
